remarks: Commutative/associative law that swaps the first two terms in a triple sum.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)
statement:
addd.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
addd.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
addd.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) $.
add12d $p |- ( ph -> ( A + ( B + C ) ) = ( B + ( A + C ) ) ) $.
